com.fssa.needstobedone - package com.fssa.needstobedone
This package is like the main control room of the needs to be done portal.
com.fssa.needstobedone.dao - package com.fssa.needstobedone.dao
This package contains Data Access Object (DAO) classes that handle database interactions for various entities.
com.fssa.needstobedone.exception - package com.fssa.needstobedone.exception
This package contains user-defined exceptions that help the needs to be done portal to handle unexpected situations.
com.fssa.needstobedone.model - package com.fssa.needstobedone.model
This package has classes that represent different modules in the needs to be done portal.
com.fssa.needstobedone.services - package com.fssa.needstobedone.services
This package has classes that manage different parts of the needs to be done portal.

com.fssa.needstobedone.utils - package com.fssa.needstobedone.utils
This package includes useful helpers for various tasks in the app.
com.fssa.needstobedone.validation - package com.fssa.needstobedone.validation
This package contains classes responsible for validating data inputs and ensuring they meet specific criteria.
